issue.subject: Direct acces to a metadata does not check accessscopes
issue.description:
If a users knows the metadata URL, he can open the sheet. Access scopes are not checked.
I propose to do this in the controller to avoid loading the data from catalog (CSW) for no reason.

journals.notes:
Hi Yves,

Access scope have unfortunately not been confronted to all use cases and it's one of them.
Before realizing such feature, I guess that it is important to have a global vision of these use cases as other extensions are accessing metadata (and proxy servlet too).

For my point of view, Community has worked on access scope definition but not on implementation; and with such logical implementation should be a discussed feature and not a defect fixed quickly.

As this big picture is not so clear for me, I prefer being prudent. May be you are totally sure that your proposal won't break any other existing feature :-)

Thanks

Hi Bruno,

Working on #770, I saw that other views/features are checked, such as "preview" (map), "download" and "add to basket".
Metadata sheet is the only one that I saw with this problem.
Certainly not checked, because links are not shown if not logged in (no results in search)

OK, thanks for your explanations.
We can go ahead as you proposed.
